english.segment1: Wasted, disposable dying scum. Two months tops before silence replace your small beating drum. Isn't that what we're all waiting for. So we can go home and celebrate our good life
english.segment2: But I feel gun powder. Burning under my skin. Don't say another word. You might set off a spark. Cause I've got gun powder. Burning under my skin
english.segment3: Take me back to TV-land. Numbness is a safe zone. They never trained me for reality. I'm a reality-TV clone. Now did you say your 10 going on 11. Something is terribly wrong. Somehow I'm dying with you
english.segment4: But I feel gun powder. Burning under my skin. Don't say another word. You might set off a spark. Cause I've got gun powder. Burning under my skin
